channel.title: NPC's not adding?
channel.description:
When I try to add an NPC that's not already there, I do it. Compile, which works just fine,
Then I run the server and it comes up with some errors let's say 4. So I try to fix the errors and I don't know what I'm doing wrong. Here's an example of a code that doesn't work for me. (DeltaScape source)
[code] spawn = 2264 3063 4825 0 3067 4829 3021 4821 1[/code]

item.title: NPC's not adding?
item.dc:creator: @tajkillerscape tajkillerscape
item.description:
@tajkillerscape wrote:

ok dude…deltascape sucks…it has a nuller well 5 of them dont use the source…its just not for you.

Read full topic

item.title: NPC's not adding?
item.dc:creator: @Zev Zev
item.description:
@Zev wrote:

Well, first of all; you do not need to compile the cfg files. Just reset the server.

The easiest way to add npc’s is go to autospawn.cfg rename it autospawn.txt and then open go to the bottom and type spawn = npcid coord coord 0 0 0 0 0 1
then save.

at the top click edit and undo or type cntrl+z then reset the server.

Read full topic
